New Records: The Astros had won a MLB-record ten consecutive postseason openers before this game.
The Astros are in the playoffs for a franchise-record eighth straight year.
Key Match Events: Tarik Skubal struck out six batters and did not allow an earned run over six innings.
Yainer Diaz's RBI single in the ninth inning.
Jason Heyward hit a game-ending line out against Beau Brieske.
Post-Match Reflections: Tarik Skubal expressed that it was the most nervous he had been since his debut and enjoyed the challenge.
Astros manager Joe Espada credited Skubal for his performance and mentioned the team's missed opportunities.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win marked the first postseason victory for the Tigers since Game 4 of the AL championship series in 2013.
It was the first time Detroit qualified for the playoffs since 2014.
